document.docAuthor: Mazur, Andrzej, Yan, Wei & Górz, Andrzej
document.masterDocTitle: New locality and new habitat data of Philonthus nitidus (Fabr., 1787) (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae) in the Polish Carpathians

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New locality and new habitat data of Philonthus nitidus (Fabr., 1787) (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae) in the Polish Carpathians

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Department of Forest Entomology, Faculty of Forestry, Poznan Life Sciences University, Wojska Polskiego 71 C, 60 - 625 Poznan, Poland. E-mail: andrzej. mazur @ up. poznan. pl
Department of Forest Entomology, Faculty of Forestry, Poznan Life Sciences University, Wojska Polskiego 71 C, 60 - 625 Poznan, Poland. E-mail: andrzej. mazur @ up. poznan. pl
Institute of Biology, Pedagogical University of Cracow Podchorążych 2, 30 - 084 Krakow, Poland. E-mail: agorz 77 @ gmail. com

subSubSection.paragraph:
the period of the study, a total of 310 samples were collected, and 12470 beetles from the family Staphylinidae were identified.
Philonthus nitidus
was found in 71 samples with a total number of 285 specimens
( 143 ♂♂ and 142 ♀♀ )
.
